attributes.action: Stop the closing of local hospitals in lancaster and preston
attributes.additional_details: Because it impacts so many local people.  Brings worry and upset to all nhs staff and there patients.could mean disadvantaged people are unable to get health care and this is against the disability act. People cant travel
attributes.background: Not close Lancaster and preston hospital and do not open a super hospital.  We do not want this

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the request you have made is a matter for the relevant NHS trust, not the Government or House of Commons.
